# AI model building fundamentals

## Synopsis
 Introduce AI fundamentals, popular models and applications, and AI model building blocks and detail how to effectively and programmatically combine these building blocks to develop an AI model appropriate to a research problem.

## Learning outcome
Trainees will gain sufficient knowledge to select, build, and run an AI model for solving an Arctic science problem related to image analysis and processing of structured scientific data.

## Tools
AI tools: Pytorch, Tensorflow, Data visualization tools: Matplotlib, PDG
